subject: Hockey, Ice
Prudential Center (Newark)
lead_paragraph: Inside the Prudential Center, most of the 17,625 fans cheered the Devils. About one-quarter of them rooted for the Rangers. The majority went home sad.
snippet: Inside the Prudential Center, most of the 17,625 fans cheered the Devils. About one-quarter of them rooted for the Rangers. The majority went home sad.
